attributes.action: Rangers Fans Demand A Public Enquiry On Liquidation
attributes.additional_details:
As Rangers fans we demand a full ranging Public Enquiry in to the actions of all parties involved in the sale, administration and eventual liquidation of Rangers Football Club.
These parties include HMRC, The Media (Specifically The BBC), Lloyds Bank, Murray International Holdings, Craig Whyte, Collyer Bristow Solicitors, Ticketus, Harper MacLeod Solicitors, Duff & Phelps, BDO, The SFA and The SPL.
This list is not exhaustive.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the SPL and SFA.
